name: Alone? (itch) (rousbound, Thiago Avidos)
description:
This game is a thought exercise about language, the other, and the ultimate question of whether or not we are together or alone.

And also how language is the Tool that simultaneously joins and separate us.

Of course, this game woudn't be possible without adding the "partial multiplayer" element, which the player will find out in this game, and also in their own life.


Controls

AWDS or Arrow keys for movement

Pay  a lot of attention to the messages, for example:

- Look "U"p stand for pressing U to jump...

Obs:

We found out at the last minute we need SSL certification on our server to make the html5 version work with multiplayer. So we are making available the executables until we fix the SSL thing.

Obs2:

If you are interested in playing the multiplayer version and is not comfortable with downloading the executables, leave a comment that we will answer when the html5 version is out :)
